contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox adult biography | name = Jacklyn Lick | image= Jacklyn Lick, February 2006, 2.JPG | caption = Jacklyn Lick at the 2006 [[FOXE Awards]] | birth_name = Jacklyn Lick<ref>{{cite news|title= INNOCENT ME TAKES WALK ON THE WILD SIDE|last=Steve Dunleavy|date=1999-04-16|work=[[New York Post]]|accessdate=20 February 2010}}</ref> | birth_date = {{birth date and age|mf=yes|1970|05|20}} | birth_place = [[Portland, Oregon|Portland]], [[Oregon]], [[United States|U.S.]] | death_date = | death_place = | spouse = | height = {{height|ft=5|in=0}} | weight = {{convert|105|lb|kg st|abbr=on}} | eye_color = Green | hair_color = Brown | ethnicity = Caucasian/Native American | alias = | number_of_films = 144 as actress,<br>1 as director<ref name="IMDB"/> | website = http://www.jacklynlick.com/ | spelling = <!-- US for color, UK for colour --> }} '''Jacklyn Lick''' (born May 20, 1970 in [[Portland, Oregon|Portland]], [[Oregon]]<ref name="IMDB">{{cite web | url = http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0509115/ | title = Jacklyn Lick | publisher = IMDB | accessdate = 2010-02-10 }}</ref>) is a [[pornographic actress]] and [[bondage model]]. Lick got into the porn industry in 1996 with the help of porn actress [[Sunset Thomas]]. She continues to perform in adult films while simultaneously working in mainstream films. Lick has worked as a writer, director, and executive producer in multiple film genres. Lick has appeared in over 300 adult films, 60 mainstream films and 80 bondage/fetish films.<ref name="IMDB"/> Lick was a contract spokesperson for the adult toy company, [[Las Vegas Novelties]].<ref>{{cite web|url=http://business.avn.com/articles/17121.html|title=Kylie Ireland and Jacklyn Lick Plug Las Vegas Novelties in New Zealand.|last=Gus Mastrapa|date=2004-07-21|work=Adult Video News|accessdate=20 February 2010}}</ref> She signed a 5 year contract with [[Pipedream Products]] in 2005 when they bought Las Vegas Novelties.<ref name="pipedream" /> She was one of the first adult performers to maintain an online presence, using [[bulletin board system]]s prior to launching her own website.<ref name="pipedream">{{cite web|url=http://www.xbiz.com/news/news_piece.php?id=9642|title=Jacklyn Lick Moves to Pipedream|date=2005-07-24|work=XBIZ|accessdate=20 February 2010}}</ref> She has been a vegetarian since the age of 13 and is a supporter of [[People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals|PETA]].<ref name="peta">{{cite web|url=http://business.avn.com/articles/8701.html|title=Serenity And Jacklyn Lick Up For Sexiest Vegetarian|date=2003-06-27|work=[[AVN (magazine)|Adult Video News]]|accessdate=20 February 2010}}</ref> ==Awards== *2003 [[People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals|PETA]] Awards nomination - Sexiest Vegetarian<ref name="peta" /> ==Filmography== * ''[[Orgazmo]]'' (1996) .... Special Appearance * ''[[The Big Lebowski]]'' (1997) (uncredited) * ''Denial'' (1998) (uncredited) * ''[[8MM (film)|8MM]]'' (1999) (uncredited) .... Video Girl * ''Inmu 2'' (2001) (voice: English version) (as Jacklin Lick) .... Stepmother * ''[[Bikini Planet (film)|Bikini Planet]]'' (2002) (V) .... Veronica Labinsky * ''Naked Betrayal'' (2002) .... Alexandra * ''All for Lust'' (2003) .... Sonja * ''Being Ron Jeremy'' (2003) * ''Naked Ambition'' (2005) (TV) .... Alex Taylor * ''Exterminator City'' (2005) (V) * ''The Enigma with a Stigma'' (2006) .... Naked Woman 2 * ''[[Homo Erectus (film)|Homo Erectus]]'' (2007) ....
